Dataset Summary: This Mum_Baby dataset contains 952 babyâ€™s information including user_id, birthday, gender which were provided by customers.

item.title: ðŸ“˜ Analyzing UNIQLO sales trend with Python
item.description: Sales analysis is a way to evaluate the performance of sales by analyzing sales data. In order to improve sales effectiveness and make smart decisions, itâ€™s important to conduct sales analysis regularly. Today, I decided to share one of the sales analysis projects for UNIQLO sales data. About UNIQLO: Uniqlo is one of the brands in Fast Retailing, a global company that operates multiple fashion brands. UNIQLO generates about 1.9 trillion Yen in annual revenue (FY 2019) from 2200 stores globally.
